document.docAuthor: Ornosa, Concepción, Torres, Félix & Rúa, Pilar De La
document.masterDocTitle: Updated list of bumblebees (Hymenoptera: Apidae) from the Spanish Pyrenees with notes on their decline and conservation status

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Updated list of bumblebees (Hymenoptera: Apidae) from the Spanish Pyrenees with notes on their decline and conservation status

subSubSection.paragraph:
This bumblebee has a Pyrenean distribution between
1175 and 2250
m altitude, preferably on grassland areas of fir, beech and oak ( Ornosa & Ortiz-Sanchez 2004 ).

At present it has been collected in forest and supraforestal pastures, especially in grasslands of open forests with
Pinus uncinata
,
Abies alba .
and scattered patches of subalpine scrub with blueberry, creeping juniper, rhododendron and heather, between
1000 and 2125
m ( Fig. 7 ), on
Acinos alpinus
(L.) Moench,
Cirsium arvense
(L.) Scop.,
Cirsium acaule
(L.) Scop.,
Eryngium bourgatii Gouan.
,
Gentiana lutea
L.,
Lonicera pyrenaica
L.,
Lotus corniculatus
L.,
Medicago sativa L.
,
Rhododendron ferrugineum
L.,
Silene acaulis
(L.) Jacq.,
Taraxacum officinale Wigg.
,
Trifolium alpinum
L.,
Trifolium pratense L.
,
Trifolium repens L.
Vicia cracca L.
and
Vicia sativa L.

paragraph.materialsCitation:
New records. Andorra :
Soldeu , 28-
VII-2006, 2
males, 2 workers C. Ornosa leg., UCME .
